name: git-desktop-browser
author: Martin Buchalik
description: Browse Git repositories on your local machine.

scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspaces && npm run lint-additional-files
scripts.prepare-main-files: npm run build -w=main-process && npm run build -w=renderer && shx cp -r renderer/build/ main-process/build/renderer/
scripts.make-prod: npm run clean && npm run prepare-main-files && electron-forge make -- --buildMode=prod
scripts.make-dev: npm run clean && npm run prepare-main-files && electron-forge make -- --buildMode=dev
